attributes.action: Ask DEFRA to amend its "Welfare of Horses, Ponies, Donkeys and their Hybrids" code of priactice to say "that equines should not be utilised underground"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a small Charity that has been caring for working Pit Ponies since the 1990’s we provided a report on our experiences and the problems encountered during the course of our work. For consideration during the consultation of the new Animal Welfare Act and copied it to the discussion groups on the Equine Welfare Codes of Practice.  We were very disappointed that the use of equines underground was not to our minds properly addressed when the Equine Welfare Codes of Practice were drawn up.  We have set this petition up to seek to address this issue. 
High unemployment!  A cold winter!  Lack of opportunities! The rising price of energy!  All very good reasons to re-open small collieries.
Our report on their welfare was entitled “Horse Power” The whole document can be obtained from the Centre.
